title: Metaplanet Now Holds 2,100 Bitcoin, Purchases 68 More BTC
author: James Van Straten
summary: Metaplanet reaches a milestone of 0.01% of the total bitcoin supply.
content:
Metaplanet (3350) has now accumulated 2,100 bitcoin
BTC
$103,827.77
, now holding 0.01% of the total BTC supply that will ever be mined, which is 21 million BTC. Metaplanet purchased 68.59 BTC for $6.6 million at an average purchase price of $96,335 per bitcoin.

According to Dylan Le Clair, Metaplanet has raised $20 million in equity capital in the first two trading days of its "21 million plan". Metaplanet also announced on Feb. 18 that they will execute a 10-1 stock split on April 1. This comes just eight months after a reverse a 1-for-10 reverse split.

Metaplanet shares are up over 1% in the current market trading; shares are trading at 6,260 JPY.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The news describes Metaplanet's significant Bitcoin accumulation and capital raising, indicating institutional buying confidence in Bitcoin.
